document.full_text: inspectors examining packages at anchorage's international airport discovered large quantities of heroin cached in shipments of purses, baby wipes and picture frames, an official said monday.
document.title: heroin found in purses and baby wipes at anchorage airport
lines_and_colors: inspectors examining packages at anchorage's international airport discovered large quantities of heroin cached in shipments of purses, baby wipes and picture frames, an official said monday.
